title: How to share a copy of my Google Docs document
content:
In your Google Docs document, click
File > Make a copy
.
Click
Share:
Under
General access
, click
Restricted
and select
Anyone with the link:
Click
Copy link
and then click
Done.
Send the link to us
.
Note:
Grammarly employees will need to view your document to investigate this issue.
